reporter_caption.center: S.L. v. DEPT. OF CHILDREN, 984 So.2d 1264 (Fla.App. 5 Dist. 2008)

caption.center: S.L., MOTHER OF C.L., A CHILD, Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF CHILDREN AND

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Seminole County, Nancy F. Alley, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Sara B. Howeller, Goldenrod, for Appellant.
Kelly A. Swartz, Department of Children and Families, Rockledge, for Appellee.
Jennifer S. Paullin, Orlando, for Guardian Ad Litem Program.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
PALMER, C.J., SAWAYA and TORPY, JJ., concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL THE TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DISPOSED OF.
